subject: Re: Thank you, we are accepting your loan request
body:
Your your credit report doesn't matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this deal will expire TONIGHT):
 
$393,000+ loan
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
 
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this elementary form... 
 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
